TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebApplicationInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供与状况事件相关的信息。

span.span: Provides information associated with health events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 实例类包含使用任何派生自的类型获取的信息类型。Instances of the class contain information that is obtained using any of the types derived from the type. 应用程序需要访问受保护的信息提供的此类型的适当权限。Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access protected information provided by this type. 下面是可用于包含应用程序信息的记录错误事件启用 ASP.NET 配置文件的摘录。The following is an excerpt of a configuration file you could use to enable ASP.NET to log error events that contain application information. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下你将能够实现时，使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，你将通过指定中的值来控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义事件类的示例，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of creating a custom event class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个部分。The following code example has two parts. 第一部分是使 ASP.NET 能够使用自定义事件的配置文件的摘录。The first part is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event. 第二个演示如何使用创建该自定义事件类。The second shows how to create that custom event by using the class. 请确保，自定义事件引发在适当的时候，即，将引发它取代了等效的系统运行状况事件时。Ensure that your custom event is raised at the proper time, that is, when the equivalent system health event it replaces would be raised. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation/CS/webapplicationinformation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation/VB/webapplicationinformation.vb#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void FormatToString(class System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter formatter) cil managed

param.name: formatter
param.span: 包含用于设置 Web 运行状况事件信息格式的制表符和缩进设置的 。

span.span: The that contains the tab and indentation settings used to format the Web health event information.

summary.span: 设置应用程序信息的格式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为事件的信息，这很有用，如果必须记录事件数据，并将其更高版本提供给用户提供统一的格式。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 当提供程序调用了一个在内部调用方法。It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. > [!NOTE] > 格式设置为显示你自定义事件的信息，当重写方法而不是方法。When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置自定义信息的格式。The following code example shows how to format custom information. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation/CS/webapplicationinformation.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation/VB/webapplicationinformation.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过调用设置事件信息方法。The method formats event information by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 格式设置为显示你自定义事件的信息，当重写方法，而不是这方法。When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than this method. 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 有关使用的示例方法，请参阅。For an example of using the method, see .
